title: Fingerprint sensor isn't working anymore after Android 11 update on pixel 3XL.
content:
After Android 11 and October 20 patch update, the fingerprint sensor isn't working anymore on Pixel 3xl. I cant unlock, open notification panel with fingerprint. Even i cant add another fingerprint though its not recognizing my finger.
I did factory reset, reboot, but its not working.


 You have any kinda solution please help.
